title: Rooney? Martinez? Potter? Who could replace Benitez at Everton?
description: Rafael Benitez has been sacked by Everton, leaving Farhad Moshiri searching for a seventh permanent manager in six years.

title: Pundits despair at England's capitulation
description: Former England cricketers and pundits reacts to the tourists' latest Ashes collapse as the England lose in Hobart and Australia complete a 4-0 series win.

title: Texas synagogue hostage-taker was British – reports
description: The man detained four people during a morning service and died following a standoff with police.

title: Starmer accuses PM of breaking law over No 10 parties
description: The Labour leader says Boris Johnson has lied about "industrial scale partying" in Downing Street.

title: Langwith Junction: Murder probe after woman, 86, found dead
description: An 88-year-old man with life-threatening injures was also found at a house in Derbyshire.

title: Nadine Dorries: BBC licence fee announcement will be the last
description: The culture secretary says it is time to discuss new ways to fund and sell "great British content".

title: Pacific volcano: Ash-covered Tonga is like a moonscape say residents
description: A huge underwater volcano that triggered tsunami waves has caused "significant damage" to Tonga.

title: Peter Seabrook: Gardening writer and broadcaster dies aged 86
description: Tributes are paid to the author and former BBC Gardeners' World presenter who died on Friday.

title: Novak Djokovic: Tennis star deported after losing Australia visa battle
description: The unvaccinated tennis star gets flight out from Melbourne Airport after losing visa challenge.

title: How tennis reacted to Djokovic's deportation from Australia
description: Novak Djokovic says he is "extremely disappointed" with a court decision to stop him defending his Australian Open title and deport him from the country.

title: Australia tormented Djokovic - Serbian president
description: Aleksandar Vucic describes Australia's treatment of the tennis star as torment and torture.

title: The Ashes: Australia complete Ashes win as England collapse again - highlights
description: Watch highlights as England's miserable Ashes tour ends with a final calamitous batting failure as Australia surge to a 146-run victory in the final Test to claim a 4-0 series win.

title: The Ashes: England crushed by Australia in final Test
description: England's miserable Ashes tour ends with one last calamitous batting failure as Australia surge to a 146-run victory in the final Test for a 4-0 series win.

title: Piel Island: Search for licensee to run 300-year-old pub
description: The successful applicant will be "crowned" monarch of Piel by having alcohol poured over them.

title: The Ashes: Alex Carey takes brilliant catch to remove Chris Woakes
description: Watch as wicketkeeper Alex Carey takes a "brilliant" one-handed catch to remove Chris Woakes for five as Australia close in on victory in the fifth Ashes Test in Hobart.

title: Novak Djokovic: The visa drama in 90 seconds
description: Deported from Australia and unable to defend his Open title, how did it get to this point?

title: Australian Open 2022 preview: Emma Raducanu & Andy Murray play after Novak Djokovic row
description: Emma Raducanu and Andy Murray lead the British interest before the start of an Australian Open that will not feature Novak Djokovic.

title: Crocodile found under Rhondda school floor on display
description: The head teacher thought the story of the 120-year-old skeleton was a myth - until it turned up.

title: Yorkshire heart attack patient urged to take lift to York hospital
description: Graham Reagan says the ambulance service urged him to get a lift to hospital or face a long wait.

title: Aberfan: Permanent home sought for disaster artefacts
description: There are fears items like the clock recovered from the disaster will be lost once their keepers die.

title: Kenyan vigilantes taking on avocado gangs
description: Cartels have begun to target the lucrative crop and farmers are arming themselves.

title: Rutland sea dragon: How remarkable ichthyosaur fossil was protected
description: The inside story on how the UK's largest, most complete ichthyosaur fossil was saved for the nation.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'view from a window'
description: A selection of striking images from our readers around the world.

title: Blind woodturner: I don't want my eyesight back
description: Chris Fisher taught himself woodturning by listening to about 600 hours of YouTube videos.

title: The inventor inspired by a near-death experience
description: He nearly died after being given fake medicines. Now, his invention can spot them.
